entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 09:00 AM PST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.0°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: 4.6°C
Wind: SE 30 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections late this morning and this afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain beginning late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 04 February 2023
